format: The components of the data frame are:
title: Student Survey Data
description:
Description
This data frame contains the responses of 237 Statistics I students at
the University of Adelaide to a number of questions.

parameters.W.Hnd: writing hand of student. (Factor, with levels "Left" and "Right".)
parameters.Pulse: pulse rate of student (beats per minute).
parameters.Fold:
“Fold your arms! Which is on top” (Factor, with levels
"R on L", "L on R", "Neither".)
parameters.Sex: The sex of the student. (Factor with levels "Male" and "Female".)
parameters.Smoke:
how much the student smokes. (Factor, levels "Heavy",
"Regul" (regularly), "Occas" (occasionally),
"Never".)
parameters.Height: height of the student in centimetres.
parameters.Clap:
‘Clap your hands!  Which hand is on top?’ (Factor, with levels
"Right", "Left", "Neither".)
parameters.Exer:
how often the student exercises. (Factor, with levels "Freq"
(frequently), "Some", "None".)
parameters.Wr.Hnd:
span (distance from tip of thumb to tip of little finger of spread
hand) of writing hand, in centimetres.
parameters.Age: age of the student in years.
parameters.M.I:
whether the student expressed height in imperial
(feet/inches) or metric (centimetres/metres) units. (Factor, levels
"Metric", "Imperial".)
